description:
A Hollywood actress who works as a dealer at Howard Resort. Despite her movie status, she admits her popularity pales in comparison to Rio`s.
She was possessed by Misery`s ghost in episode 3, and was later freed from her control after the latter`s loss. However, it is later revealed that Misery`s spirit still resides in her body, as shown in episode 9 when she takes control of Rosa`s body to warn Rio of her castle being on the verge of being demolished by Cartia and in episode 12 during a ping-pong match with the other girls in a hot spring.
name: Rosa Canyon
